<!-- source-hash: c155c514d00751c218d06ee8b6e2aaf0 -->
A DTO (Data Transfer Object) class that represents URL configuration data for external tools, including endpoint, port, and type information.

## Key Components

- **ToolUrlResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern
- **url** - String field for the base URL endpoint of the external tool
- **port** - String field for the port number (stored as String for flexibility)
- **type** - String field indicating the URL type (e.g., "DASHBOARD", "API", etc.)

## Usage Example

```java
// Using builder pattern
ToolUrlResponse response = ToolUrlResponse.builder()
    .url("https://rmm.example.com")
    .port("8443")
    .type("DASHBOARD")
    .build();

// Using constructor
ToolUrlResponse response = new ToolUrlResponse(
    "https://api.example.com", 
    "443", 
    "API"
);

// Accessing fields
String endpoint = response.getUrl();
String portNumber = response.getPort();
String urlType = response.getType();
```

The class is designed for API responses and includes Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for automatic documentation generation. The `@Schema` annotations provide descriptions and examples for API documentation tools.
